title: Alex.Jones.Show.2008.07.02-chakra71
description:
Wednesday July 2, 2008

Alex welcomes whistleblower Charlotte Iserbyt, former Senior Policy Advisor in the Office of Educational Research and Improvement and author of The Deliberate Dumbing Down of America, and Richard C. Hoagland, author of Dark Mission: The Secret History of NASA. Finally, Alex talks with ex-NFL star George Martin, who walked 500 miles to raise money for afflicted 9/11 first responders. 

Sourced from the 32 Kbps live stream using Total Recorder 7 Pro, or from the 42 Kbps podcast.  Re-encoded to 32 Kbps @ 22.05 KHz.  Editing done using Nero WaveEditor 4 by hand. Four hours duration before commercial edit takes it down to about 3 hours of playing time.
